product_name: Lowa S-Crown GTX Trail-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: All-season shoes built wth GORE-TEX(R) waterproof, breathable membranes, the Lowa S-Crown GTX Trail-Running Shoes offer dry protection and ample traction on wet and muddy trails. GORE-TEX waterproof linings keep your feet dry and comfortable by protecting them from the elements and maintaining breathability. Patented "STG" soft-to-ground midsoles provide the correct combination of shock absorption, targeted cushioning, stability and grip. Floating tongue construction fits close-to-the-foot and self-adjusts for superb fit. Elastic GORE-TEX protection over the insteps eliminates gusset wrinkles. Ortholite footbeds; dual-density EVA midsoles with polyurethane inserts for stability. Rubber outsoles on Lowa S-Trail GTX Trail-Running Shoes offer solid traction on varied terrain. Closeout.
short_description: All-season shoes built wth GORE-TEX(R) waterproof, breathable membranes, the Lowa S-Crown GTX Trail-Running Shoes offer dry protection and ample traction on wet and muddy trails.
